headline: Sen. Mark Kelly heads to Tucson after wife Gabby Giffords hospitalized with appendicitis
author: KTAR.COM
sentences: “Congresswoman Giffords checked into the hospital Tuesday and is currently being treated for appendicitis,” Jacob Peters, the senator’s communications director, said in a statement Wednesday.
PHOENIX – U.S. Sen. Mark Kelly returned home to Tucson after his wife, former Rep. Gabby Giffords, was hospitalized Tuesday with appendicitis, Kelly’s office announced.

We’re all wishing her a speedy and thorough recovery.”
No other information was made available.
Kelly has headed home to Tucson to be with her.
